00055         // template class adapterDSS,
00056         // which is a tool class for FP
00057         template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00058         class AdapterDSS 
00059         {
00060                 protected:
00061                         DGtal::ArithmeticalDSS<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>* myDSS;
00062                 public:
00063                         virtual DGtal::PointVector<2,TInteger> firstLeaningPoint() const = 0;
00064                         virtual DGtal::PointVector<2,TInteger> lastLeaningPoint() const = 0;
00065         };
00066 
00067         template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00068         class AdapterDSS4ConvexPart : public AdapterDSS<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity> 
00069         {
00070                 public:
00071                         //constructor
00072                         AdapterDSS4ConvexPart(DGtal::ArithmeticalDSS<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>& aDSS)
00073                         {
00074                                 this->myDSS = &aDSS;
00075                         }
00076                         //accessors
00077                         virtual DGtal::PointVector<2,TInteger> firstLeaningPoint() const 
00078                         {
00079                                 return this->myDSS->getUf();
00080                         }
00081                         virtual DGtal::PointVector<2,TInteger> lastLeaningPoint() const
00082                         {
00083                                 return this->myDSS->getUl();
00084                         }
00085         };
00086 
00087         template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00088         class AdapterDSS4ConcavePart : public AdapterDSS<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity> 
00089         {
00090                 public:
00091                         //constructor
00092                         AdapterDSS4ConcavePart(DGtal::ArithmeticalDSS<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>& aDSS)
00093                         {
00094                                 this->myDSS = &aDSS;
00095                         }
00096                         //accessors
00097                         virtual DGtal::PointVector<2,TInteger> firstLeaningPoint() const 
00098                         {
00099                                 return this->myDSS->getLf();
00100                         }
00101                         virtual DGtal::PointVector<2,TInteger> lastLeaningPoint() const
00102                         {
00103                                 return this->myDSS->getLl();
00104                         }
00105         };
